talents.name: Pocztowy Demonspear
talents.desc:
**Normal Attack**
Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.

**Charged Attack**
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform a forward spear throw.

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Ancient Rite: Arcane Light
talents.desc:
Flins summons forth the ancient power concealed within his lamp and switches to his **Manifest Flame** form. This form has the following characteristics:
· Flins's Normal and Charged Attacks deal **Electro DMG** that cannot be overridden by other Elemental infusions, and he is unable to perform Plunging Attacks.
· His interruption resistance is increased.
· His Elemental Skill **Ancient Rite: Arcane Light** is replaced with the special Elemental Skill **Northland Spearstorm**.

**Northland Spearstorm**
Flins summons a flurry of spears in front, dealing **AoE Electro DMG** and causing his Elemental Burst **Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night** to be replaced with the special Elemental Burst **Thunderous Symphony** for the next 6s.
The base CD of **Northland Spearstorm** is 6s and will not be affected by other effects.
[Details title="Thunderous Symphony"]Consume less Elemental Energy to unleash a special Elemental Burst. Flins deals a single instance of **AoE Electro DMG**. This DMG is considered Lunar-Charged DMG.
**Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam**: If there are thunderclouds nearby, Flins will deal 1 additional instance of **AoE Electro DMG**. This DMG is considered Lunar-Charged DMG.[/Details]

ult.name: Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night
ult.desc:
Flins unleashes the true power of his lamp, dealing **AoE Electro DMG** and, after a short delay, dealing 2 instances of middle-phase and 1 instance of final-phase **AoE Electro DMG**, all of which are considered Lunar-Charged DMG.
**Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam**: Flins's Skill is enhanced: If there are thunderclouds nearby, Flins will deal an additional 2 instances of middle-phase Lunar-Charged **AoE Electro DMG**.

After using the special Elemental Skill **Northland Spearstorm**, Flins's Elemental Burst **Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night** will be replaced with the special Elemental Burst **Thunderous Symphony** for the next 6s.

**Thunderous Symphony**
Consume less Elemental Energy to unleash a special Elemental Burst. Flins deals a single instance of **AoE Electro DMG** that is considered Lunar-Charged DMG.
**Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam**: Flins's Skill is enhanced: If there are thunderclouds nearby, Flins will deal an additional instance of Lunar-Charged **AoE Electro DMG**.

passive.name: Symphony of Winter
passive.desc:
Flins will gain a corresponding buff effect based on the party's **Moonsign**.

**Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam**: Lunar-Charged reactions triggered by Flins will deal an additional 20% DMG.

passive.name: Whispering Flame
passive.desc: Flins's Elemental Mastery is increased by 8% of his ATK. The maximum increase obtainable this way is 160.

passive.name: Moonsign Benediction: Old World Secrets
passive.desc:
When a party member triggers an Electro-Charged reaction, it will be converted into the Lunar-Charged reaction, with every 100 ATK that Flins has increasing Lunar-Charged's Base DMG by 0.7%, up to a maximum of 14%.

Additionally, when Flins is in the party, the party's **Moonsign** will increase by 1 level.

passive.name: A Light in the Dark
passive.desc:
Displays the location of nearby **resources unique to Nod-Krai** on the mini-map.
Additionally, Flins appears to be able to decipher the whispers of the Wild Hunt...

constellations.name: Part the Veil of Snow
constellations.desc:
The basic cooldown of the special Elemental Skill **Northland Spearstorm** is reduced to 4s.
Additionally, when party members trigger Lunar-Charged reactions, Flins will recover 8 Elemental Energy. This effect can occur once every 5.5s.

constellations.name: The Devil's Wall
constellations.desc:
For the next 6s after using the special Elemental Skill **Northland Spearstorm**, when Flins's next Normal Attack hits an opponent, it will deal an additional 50% of Flins's ATK as **AoE Electro DMG**. This DMG is considered Lunar-Charged DMG.
**Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam**: While Flins is on the field, after his **Electro** attacks hit an opponent, that opponent's **Electro RES** will be decreased by 25% for 7s.

constellations.name: Stranger in the Night
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of **Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
[Details title="Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night"]Flins unleashes the true power of his lamp, dealing **AoE Electro DMG** and, after a short delay, dealing 2 instances of middle-phase and 1 instance of final-phase **AoE Electro DMG**, all of which are considered Lunar-Charged DMG.
**Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam**: Flins's Skill is enhanced: If there are thunderclouds nearby, Flins will deal an additional 2 instances of middle-phase Lunar-Charged **AoE Electro DMG**.

After using the special Elemental Skill **Northland Spearstorm**, Flins's Elemental Burst **Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night** will be replaced with the special Elemental Burst **Thunderous Symphony** for the next 6s.

**Thunderous Symphony**
Consume less Elemental Energy to unleash a special Elemental Burst. Flins deals a single instance of **AoE Electro DMG** that is considered Lunar-Charged DMG.
**Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam**: Flins's Skill is enhanced: If there are thunderclouds nearby, Flins will deal an additional instance of Lunar-Charged **AoE Electro DMG**.[/Details]

constellations.name: Night on Bald Mountain
constellations.desc:
Flins's ATK is increased by 20%.
Additionally, his Ascension Talent **"Whispering Flame"** is enhanced: Flins's Elemental Mastery is increased by 10% of his ATK. The maximum increase obtainable this way is 220.
[Details title="Whispering Flame"]Flins's Elemental Mastery is increased by 8% of his ATK. The maximum increase obtainable this way is 160.[/Details]

constellations.name: Exile's Shadow
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of **Ancient Rite: Arcane Light** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
[Details title="Ancient Rite: Arcane Light"]Flins summons forth the ancient power concealed within his lamp and switches to his **Manifest Flame** form. This form has the following characteristics:
· Flins's Normal and Charged Attacks deal **Electro DMG** that cannot be overridden by other Elemental infusions, and he is unable to perform Plunging Attacks.
· His interruption resistance is increased.
· His Elemental Skill **Ancient Rite: Arcane Light** is replaced with the special Elemental Skill **Northland Spearstorm**.

**Northland Spearstorm**
Flins summons a flurry of spears in front, dealing **AoE Electro DMG** and causing his Elemental Burst **Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night** to be replaced with the special Elemental Burst **Thunderous Symphony** for the next 6s.
The base CD of **Northland Spearstorm** is 6s and will not be affected by other effects.[/Details]

constellations.name: Songs and Dances of Death
constellations.desc:
The DMG dealt to opponents by Flins's Lunar-Charged reactions is **elevated** by 35%.
**Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam**: All nearby party members' Lunar-Charged DMG is **elevated** by 10%.
[Details title="Elevation"]Special DMG Boost effect. It is calculated independently of other DMG Boost effects.[/Details]
